R001.rule_description: Validates that required fields are populated and not null or empty

R002.rule_description: Ensures date fields follow standard ISO format (YYYY-MM-DD)

R003.rule_description: Validates that numeric values fall within acceptable business ranges

R004.rule_description: Ensures consistency between related fields across records

R005.rule_description: Validates that foreign key references exist in master data tables

R006.rule_description: Identifies duplicate records based on business key combinations

R007.rule_description: Calculates overall data quality score based on multiple rule assessments
